EmailTemplate.description: 777 follow-up response where adjustment was not possible or No response in acceleration tool
EmailTemplate.name: Order Expedite Request Follow-up No Adjustment Possible
EmailTemplate.subject: Order Expedite Request {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
We have evaluated the ability to support your requirement for an expedited shipping date and unfortunately, we are unable to accommodate a change to the dates already acknowledged. We have noted your request and if things change in our schedules, we will look to ship your order sooner. Ongoing status will be reflected in our portal at www.MyAerospace.com.
Your PO#: <Enter customer PO Number> Honeywell Sales Order #: <Enter sales order number>
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
